Body:
"""Jog forward and reverse with APT Piezo Inertia Actuator.

    Tested with KIM101 driver connected to PIM1 mirror mount.
    """
with expected_protocol(ik.thorlabs.APTPiezoInertiaActuator, [init_kim101[0],
    ThorLabsPacket(message_id=ThorLabsCommands.PZMOT_MOVE_JOG, param1=1,
    param2=1, dest=80, source=1, data=None).pack(), ThorLabsPacket(
    message_id=ThorLabsCommands.PZMOT_MOVE_JOG, param1=1, param2=2, dest=80,
    source=1, data=None).pack()], [init_kim101[1]], sep='') as apt:
    apt.channel[0].move_jog()
    apt.channel[0].move_jog('rev')
